name: Me & My Birdie
description:
Bring the food to hungry Crocodile and eat crumbles for your health too!

Me & My birdie

This cute little birdie is referred to as the crocodile bird for its alleged symbiotic relationship with crocodiles.
But we found out that is not true. Sad.

So we made this game. They still can have a win-win relationship.
The crocodile is stuck and hungry. The birdie is hungry too.
In the wild city, food is kinda hard to eat for birdie. The crocodile can break every food so birdie decided to get food for him. So birdie can eat some nice food for herself too.


You control this cute one. The birdie!
Bring the food to hungry Crocodile and eat crumbles for your health too!

Use your time wisely. If you take too long, hangry will come !

< Controls >

WASD - Move birdie
Space - Jump
Double space - double jumps

< Credit >

Programming - Hoon
Pixel art - Miniyeti

BGM - Ultimate Game Music Collection - Teddy
